document.full_text: britain's prince charles will unwind after the wedding of his son prince william to kate middleton by jetting off to washington to meet u.s. president barack obama and give a speech, his aides said on thursday.
document.title: prince charles headed to u.s. after wedding
lines_and_colors: britain's prince charles will unwind after the wedding of his son prince william to kate middleton by jetting off to washington to meet u.s. president barack obama and give a speech, his aides said on thursday.
